snippet.title: Master of Chess - Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
First and only chess career simulator is out in Early Access on Steam! Play chess with help from your AI character, solve chess puzzles, build an unrivaled openings repertoire, and win tournaments worldwide. Can you become World Chess Champion?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2248900/Master_of_Chess/
